Choose a Theme We’ve chosen a design theme for your store to get you started, but you can easily change your design by picking a new theme. We have dozens of options available, and all of them are modern, mobile-friendly and include best practices to maximize your conversion. Need help changing your theme? Refer to our Theme & Design Overview <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Themes-Design-Overview?utm_campaign=SS:%202016%20Post%20Pdaid%20Email%20Nurture&utm_source=Email&utm_medium=email%20&utm_content=Themes%20and%20Design%20Overview]]>. Spotlight your best products and improve conversion with a premium theme All of our premium themes have a modern design and powerful features, like:
- Fully responsive design to ensure your site looks great on all types of devices
- Style Editor to design just the store you want
- Promotion carousel with intelligent scaling to highlight your best products
- Category listings across pages help shoppers find products
You can instantly preview any of our themes before upgrading. Browse Themes <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme-store/]]>
